body.body: With the crankcase halves separated, lift out the balancer shaft complete with the shaft bearings/circlips.
To remove the left hand bearing, slide the bearing, circlip and bearing sleeve from the balancer shaft.
To remove the right hand bearing, remove the fixing and slide the circlip, bearing race and inner ring from the shaft.
When removing the circlip, always ensure that the area where the breather seal runs does not become scratched or damaged. A damaged seal track will cause oil to be ejected from the engine.
